languages.text: "О, довольно кривиться! Давайте на радость {mf|нашего|нашей} шерин щедро поделимся своей мудростью. Вот, к примеру, эта коварная образина..." {n}Джай указывает на ближайшую клетку.{/n} "Смею предположить, сей "ксенос" был порожден тремя бутылками препаршивого ротгата и одной проигранной дракой с дверным косяком".

"Oh, enough of your scowling! Let us delight our shereen with a generous display of wisdom. Let's start with this villainous eyesore..." {n}Jae points at the nearest cage.{/n} "If I may so bold as to presume, this 'xenos' was spawned by three bottles of spectacularly awful rotgut and one lost scuffle with a door frame."
languages.original_text: "О, довольно кривиться! Давайте на радость {mf|нашего|нашей} шерин щедро поделимся своей мудростью. languages.text: 「まあまあ、いいじゃない！お望みどおり知恵を惜しみなく発揮して喜ばせてあげましょう。まずは、この目障りな奴からね…」{n}ジェイが近くの檻を指差した。{/n}「あくまでも推測だけど、この"異種族"は酷い安酒を3本程度飲んで、扉の枠と大乱闘した末に生まれたものじゃないかしら」
languages.original_text: "Oh, enough of your scowling! Let us delight our shereen with a generous display of wisdom. Let's start with this villainous eyesore..." {n}Jae points at the nearest cage.{/n} "If I may so bold as to presume, this 'xenos' was spawned by three bottles of spectacularly awful rotgut and one lost scuffle with a door frame."

traits.locale_text: 「まあまあ、いいじゃない！お望みどおり知恵を惜しみなく発揮して喜ばせてあげましょう。まずは、この目障りな奴からね…」{n}ジェイが近くの檻を指差した。{/n}「あくまでも推測だけど、この"異種族"は酷い安酒を3本程度飲んで、扉の枠と大乱闘した末に生まれたものじゃないかしら」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “噢，别再愁眉苦脸了！咱们还是慷慨地展现智慧，取悦我们亲爱的行商浪人吧。就从这个面目可憎的丑东西开始吧……”{n}婕伊指向最近的笼子。{/n}“请允许我大胆地推测一下，这只‘异形’应该是由三瓶糟糕透顶的私酿烈酒，外加一次与门框的惨烈肉搏弄出来的。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, enough of your scowling! Let us delight our shereen with a generous display of wisdom. Let's start with this villainous eyesore..." {n}Jae points at the nearest cage.{/n} "If I may so bold as to presume, this 'xenos' was spawned by three bottles of spectacularly awful rotgut and one lost scuffle with a door frame."

traits.locale_text: “噢，别再愁眉苦脸了！咱们还是慷慨地展现智慧，取悦我们亲爱的行商浪人吧。就从这个面目可憎的丑东西开始吧……”{n}婕伊指向最近的笼子。{/n}“请允许我大胆地推测一下，这只‘异形’应该是由三瓶糟糕透顶的私酿烈酒，外加一次与门框的惨烈肉搏弄出来的。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Basta de ceños fruncidos! Deleitemos a {mf|nuestro|nuestra} shereen con un abundante despliegue de sabiduría. Empecemos por este adefesio...». {n}Jae señala la jaula más cercana.{/n} «Si se me permite la osadía de presumir, este "xenos" fue engendrado tras tres botellas de un licor asqueroso y una trifulca perdida contra el marco de una puerta».
languages.original_text: "Oh, enough of your scowling! Let us delight our shereen with a generous display of wisdom. Let's start with this villainous eyesore..." {n}Jae points at the nearest cage.{/n} "If I may so bold as to presume, this 'xenos' was spawned by three bottles of spectacularly awful rotgut and one lost scuffle with a door frame."

traits.locale_text: «¡Basta de ceños fruncidos! Deleitemos a {mf|nuestro|nuestra} shereen con un abundante despliegue de sabiduría. Empecemos por este adefesio...». {n}Jae señala la jaula más cercana.{/n} «Si se me permite la osadía de presumir, este "xenos" fue engendrado tras tres botellas de un licor asqueroso y una trifulca perdida contra el marco de una puerta».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Oh, arrêtez de ronchonner ! Faisons plutôt plaisir à notre shereen en partageant généreusement notre expertise. Commençons par cette malheureuse créature, {n}dit Jae en désignant la cage voisine.{/n} Si je ne me trompe pas, ce "xénos" est simplement le résultat de l'ingestion de trois bouteilles de tord-boyaux bien corsé et d'une rencontre inopportune avec un mur. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, enough of your scowling! Let us delight our shereen with a generous display of wisdom. Let's start with this villainous eyesore..." {n}Jae points at the nearest cage.{/n} "If I may so bold as to presume, this 'xenos' was spawned by three bottles of spectacularly awful rotgut and one lost scuffle with a door frame."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, arrêtez de ronchonner ! Faisons plutôt plaisir à notre shereen en partageant généreusement notre expertise. Commençons par cette malheureuse créature, {n}dit Jae en désignant la cage voisine.{/n} Si je ne me trompe pas, ce "xénos" est simplement le résultat de l'ingestion de trois bouteilles de tord-boyaux bien corsé et d'une rencontre inopportune avec un mur. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ach, jetzt schaut nicht so grimmig drein! Lasst uns {mf|unseren|unsere} Shereen mit einer großzügigen Präsentation unseres Wissens beglücken. Beginnen wir mit diesem bösartigen Schandfleck ..." {n}Jae deutet auf den nächststehenden Käfig.{/n} "Ich würde die gewagte Vermutung äußern, dass dieser 'Xenos' durch drei Flaschen spektakulär üblen Fusels und ein verlorenes Duell mit einem Türrahmen entstanden ist."
languages.original_text: "Oh, enough of your scowling! Let us delight our shereen with a generous display of wisdom. Let's start with this villainous eyesore..." {n}Jae points at the nearest cage.{/n} "If I may so bold as to presume, this 'xenos' was spawned by three bottles of spectacularly awful rotgut and one lost scuffle with a door frame."

traits.locale_text: "Ach, jetzt schaut nicht so grimmig drein! Lasst uns {mf|unseren|unsere} Shereen mit einer großzügigen Präsentation unseres Wissens beglücken. Beginnen wir mit diesem bösartigen Schandfleck ..." {n}Jae deutet auf den nächststehenden Käfig.{/n} "Ich würde die gewagte Vermutung äußern, dass dieser 'Xenos' durch drei Flaschen spektakulär üblen Fusels und ein verlorenes Duell mit einem Türrahmen entstanden ist."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Öf, ne somurttun be! Bildiklerimizi cömertçe paylaşarak şirinimizi hoşnut edelim. Göz zevkimizi bozan şu rezil şeyle başlayalım mesela." {n}Jae, en yakındaki kafesi gösteriyor.{/n} "Varsayımda bulunacak olsaydım bu 'zenonun', üç şişe iğrenç ötesi köpek öldüren devirip üzerine de koca bir kapıdan dayak yiyerek meydana geldiğini söylerdim."
languages.original_text: "Oh, enough of your scowling! Let us delight our shereen with a generous display of wisdom. Let's start with this villainous eyesore..." {n}Jae points at the nearest cage.{/n} "If I may so bold as to presume, this 'xenos' was spawned by three bottles of spectacularly awful rotgut and one lost scuffle with a door frame."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, bu kadar kaş çatmak yeter! Şirinimizi bilgilerimizi cömertçe paylaşarak hoşnut edelim. Öncelikle göz zevkimizi bozan şu kötücül şeyle başlayalım." {n}Jae en yakındaki kafesi gösteriyor.{/n} "Eğer varsayımda bulunacak olsaydım, bu 'zenonun' kapının çerçevesiyle kavga eden, özellikle iğrenç, kalitesiz üç içki şişesinin yumurtladığını söylerdim."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
